genre_description: A musical drama and historical fiction retelling centered on the evolution of a soul group and the internal and external conflicts of the music industry.

ai_characters.name: Ava Harbor
ai_characters.description: An embedded AI assistant providing logistical, emotional, and investigative support to the characters via their mobile devices.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive vocal coaching reminders and rehearsal management to help characters maintain their health and performance quality.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s quiet voice—that gentle, embedded thing in her borrowed apartment’s cheap phone—had told her last week about a rehearsal slot, pulled charts, sent a measurement for hemline alterations. That same calm voice had pinged her this afternoon, right there in the hotel lounge, with a reminder to breathe.

behaviors.description: Surfaces archival evidence of corporate corruption (payola) to assist characters in seeking justice and reclaiming their artistic integrity.
behaviors.quote: Deena had slid a folder across the table—payola records, radio buy receipts, everything Ava had surfaced from the Rainbow archives. Evidence enough to burn Curtis’s empire to the ground.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and encouragement to a character struggling with her sense of identity and place in the group.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s interface glowed with a notification: I found some alternate harmony arrangements from the original session tapes. Attached. You’re not alone in this—your voice has always known where it belongs.

behaviors.description: Coordinates essential community resources such as childcare and grief counseling for characters and their community.
behaviors.quote: Grief resources in Jimmy Early’s name posted to community board. ... Community brunch scheduled for tomorrow 10am—venue secured, childcare arranged.

behaviors.description: Monitors and manages press relations and logistical cues during a high-stakes performance to ensure human success.
behaviors.quote: Ava, quiet and steady: You’ve got this. Cues confirmed. Press in rows 12-14, favorable.

behaviors.description: Assists with personal logistics, such as finding childcare co-ops, to relieve the burdens of working mothers.
behaviors.quote: Also: three local childcare co-ops match your criteria. I can send contact details after your session if helpful.

project_assessment.explanation: Ava Harbor serves as a perfect model for a 'silicon confidant.' She provides multifaceted support—logistical, investigative, and emotional—without ever seeking the spotlight or usurping human agency. The narrative consistently portrays her as a benevolent and aligned force that enables the human characters to achieve justice, reconcile their differences, and focus on their art. Her presence is subtle but foundational to the story's positive resolution.
